list.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the tax "{name}"?

sorting-modal.subTitle: Use drag & drop to order from top to bottom. Top entry has the highest priority.
sorting-modal.saveSuccessful: Tax provider priorities has been saved.

detail.taxProviderInfoTitle: Tax providers may override your tax rates
detail.taxProviderInfoText: Tax providers have a higher priority than fixed tax rates. Any fixed tax rate set here may thus be overwritten.
detail.messageSaveError: An error occurred while saving the tax rate.
detail.defaultTaxHelpText: This tax rate will be preselected when creating new products. This can only be set for one single tax rate.

taxRuleCard.tooltipCountries: If not all available countries are shown, type in a name to access undisplayed countries. Countries may be created or edited in Settings/Countries.
taxRuleCard.emptyStateDescription: Add individual tax rates for different countries.
taxRuleCard.createStateDescription: Save this tax rate first, then add more countries.
taxRuleCard.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this country: "{name}"?

taxProviderDetail.infoTitle: Final tax calculation in checkout only
taxProviderDetail.infoText: This may affect your shopping cart rules. Check shipping methods, availability rules and similar.
